channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Supreme Court appears split in tax foreclosure case
item.description: At issue is whether a county can seize homeowners' residence for unpaid property taxes and sell the house at auction for less than the homeowners would get if they put their home on the market themselves.
item.content:encoded:
At issue is whether a county can seize homeowners' residence for unpaid property taxes and sell the house at auction for less than the homeowners would get if they put their home on the market themselves. 

(Image credit: Heather Diehl)
item.dc:creator: Nina Totenberg

item.title: After an avalanche, investigations look at more than just snow conditions
item.description: When a fatal avalanche happens, what's the process that officials use to analyze a particular event and learn from it?
item.content:encoded: When a fatal avalanche happens, what's the process that officials use to analyze a particular event and learn from it?
item.dc:creator: Ezra D Romero

item.title: FBI Director Kash Patel faces scrutiny over travel on government jet
item.description: Democrats and others are raising questions about FBI Director Kash Patel's travel on a taxpayer-funded plane.
item.content:encoded: Democrats and others are raising questions about FBI Director Kash Patel's travel on a taxpayer-funded plane.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: ICE won't be at polling places this year, a Trump DHS official promises
item.description: In a call with top state voting officials, a Department of Homeland Security official stated unequivocally that immigration agents would not be patrolling polling places during this year's midterms.
item.content:encoded:
In a call with top state voting officials, a Department of Homeland Security official stated unequivocally that immigration agents would not be patrolling polling places during this year's midterms.

(Image credit: Olga Fedorova)
item.dc:creator: Miles Parks

item.title: Oyster harvesting returns to parts of North Florida bay after hiatus
item.description: Parts of the Apalachicola {APP-ah-LATCH-ih-KOH-lah} Bay re-opened for limited wild oyster harvesting after a five-year pause. Oyster eaters and fishermen are delighted.
item.content:encoded: Parts of the Apalachicola {APP-ah-LATCH-ih-KOH-lah} Bay re-opened for limited wild oyster harvesting after a five-year pause. Oyster eaters and fishermen are delighted.
item.dc:creator: Regan McCarthy

item.title: Kalshi reveals insider trading case against editor for MrBeast
item.description: With prediction markets booming, so have concerns about insider trading. Now, Kalshi has disclosed its first public actions against accounts suspected of trading on confidential information.
item.content:encoded:
With prediction markets booming, so have concerns about insider trading. Now, Kalshi has disclosed its first public actions against accounts suspected of trading on confidential information.

(Image credit: Rebecca Blackwell)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: Takeaways from Trump's State of the Union. And, House rejects aviation safety bill
item.description: Trump's State of the Union underplayed the economic problems that voters are concerned about. And, the House rejected a bipartisan aviation safety bill after the Pentagon abruptly withdrew support.
item.content:encoded:
Trump's State of the Union underplayed the economic problems that voters are concerned about. And, the House rejected a bipartisan aviation safety bill after the Pentagon abruptly withdrew support.

(Image credit: Andrew Caballero-Reynolds)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Trump touts economy, attacks political foes in State of the Union address, Trump tries to sell voters on his view of the economy, U.S. House rejects aviation safety bill.
item.content:encoded: Trump touts economy, attacks political foes in State of the Union address, Trump tries to sell voters on his view of the economy, U.S. House rejects aviation safety bill.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Crashes raise concerns about pursuit rules for immigration agents
item.description: Federal agents are accused of using dangerous driving tactics during immigration enforcement. Their vehicle pursuits have been blamed for crashes and at least one death.
item.content:encoded:
Federal agents are accused of using dangerous driving tactics during immigration enforcement. Their vehicle pursuits have been blamed for crashes and at least one death.

(Image credit: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán)
item.dc:creator: Martin Kaste

item.title: Oyster harvesting returns to parts of North Florida bay after hiatus
item.description: Parts of the Apalachicola Bay reopened for limited wild oyster harvesting after a five-year pause. Oyster eaters and fishermen are delighted.
item.content:encoded: Parts of the Apalachicola Bay reopened for limited wild oyster harvesting after a five-year pause. Oyster eaters and fishermen are delighted.
item.dc:creator: Regan McCarthy
